{fànzhuō} dining table: (suíbiàn) do as one pleases; do at will
(nǎ.li) I am flattered (used to reply to a compliment)
(bù gǎndāng) I really don't deserve this
(qǐng//kè) invite someone to dinner; entertain guests
(rù//zuò) take one's seat (at a banquet or ceremony)
(jiǎng.jiu) be particular or fastidious about; pay attention to
(biǎoshì) show; use words to express; indicate
(nánshuō) it is hard to say; you can never tell
(rùxiāng suísú) when in rome (do as the romans do)
